titleStmt.title: dbu ma rtsa ba'i bshad pa srog gi 'khor lo
titleStmt.author: 'u yug pa bsod nams seng ge

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

physDesc.additional: Script: 'bru tsha. Number on the last folio: 99. However, the total number of folios is 100: between the folios numbered 52 and 57, there are 4 folios with two sets of numbers, the second by a different hand - 56/53, 57/54, 58/55, 59/56 - and a folio with number "56 rjes ma." Lines per folio: 7. Rare annotations. Some parts appear faded an others blurred on the reproduction; they could have been in color on the original manuscript.

This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

lg.l: cung zad tshig gis don gyi gnad rnams nges gyur pa ||
'grel pa don chen rtsa ba'i srog gi 'khor lo 'di ||
thos pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong bsod nams seng ge yis ||
dga' bas goms phyir bla ma'i gsung bzhin bkod pa yin ||||

body.ab: dbu ma rtsa ba'i rnam par bshad pa srog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba | thos pa'i don yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong bsod nams seng ges sbyar ba | rdzogs s+hO || dge'o ||||
